author: MMChrisS
title: NBA 2K16's Pro-Am Mode, Your Thoughts?
text: # 1 Thadon89 @ 10/16/15 10:33 AM GOOD JOB WITH THE PRO AM U GUYS HAVE ALWAYS BEEN CONSTANT WITH UPDATES ALL WE NEED NOW IS NORMAN POWELL REAL FACE ON IN THE NEXT UPDATE/PATCH # 2 TheSameCrew @ 10/16/15 10:54 AM TSC is now recruiting. Come try out not just another crew but an xbox family! We in need of everything! Team first mindset! If interested then hit me up on here or xbox(the league guy). Changing my gamertag soon. So hit me up soon! You must try out, willing to meet the requirements, and pass interview. Everything will be told when you hit me up. Not in comment section. The same crew or no crew! 20/19/03!!! Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk # 3 dmslapped @ 10/16/15 12:35 PM I can usually barley see the ball with the way these people color the courts. That's my only issue with it. # 4 Teirminator @ 10/16/15 01:02 PM Did this patch come out for Xbox One yet? Hoping to check out Pro-Am this weekend. # 5 oasis90 @ 10/16/15 01:44 PM Quote: Originally Posted by Teirminator Did this patch come out for Xbox One yet? Hoping to check out Pro-Am this weekend. No, still not out.. # 6 SirGaryColeman @ 10/16/15 01:48 PM Poll needs: Loved it, BUT needs work. There are a bunch of very fixable ideas that could make Pro-AM the greatest mode of all time
